verses.text: \w So|strong="H6213"\w* Abijah slept \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* fathers, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w buried|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* city \w of|strong="H3068"\w* David; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Asa \w his|strong="H3068"\w* son reigned \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* stead. \w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* days \w the|strong="H6213"\w* land \w was|strong="H3068"\w* quiet ten years.

\w And|strong="H4196"\w* Asa did \w that|strong="H4196"\w* \w which|strong="H1116"\w* was good \w and|strong="H4196"\w* right \w in|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5493"\w* God:

\w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w took|strong="H3063"\w* away \w the|strong="H6213"\w* foreign altars, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w high|strong="H6213"\w* places, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* brake down \w the|strong="H6213"\w* pillars, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* hewed down \w the|strong="H6213"\w* Asherim,

\w and|strong="H3063"\w* commanded \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* seek \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* God \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* fathers, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w do|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* law \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* commandment.

\w Also|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w took|strong="H3063"\w* \w away|strong="H5973"\w* out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w high|strong="H1129"\w* places \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sun-images: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* kingdom \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w* \w before|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w fortified|strong="H1129"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w quiet|strong="H5117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H6440"\w* war \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H5437"\w* years, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5117"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* said \w unto|strong="H1961"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w us|strong="H1961"\w* build \w these|strong="H3605"\w* cities, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w make|strong="H5375"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H5375"\w* walls, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w towers|strong="H5375"\w*, gates, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* bars; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w yet|strong="H3605"\w* \w before|strong="H1961"\w* \w us|strong="H1961"\w*, \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* sought \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* sought \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w hath|strong="H3063"\w* \w given|strong="H5375"\w* \w us|strong="H1961"\w* \w rest|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* side. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* built \w and|strong="H3967"\w* prospered.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* Asa \w had|strong="H2428"\w* \w an|strong="H3318"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w that|strong="H5704"\w* bare bucklers \w and|strong="H3967"\w* spears, \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3318"\w* Judah \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* thousand; \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3318"\w* Benjamin, \w that|strong="H5704"\w* bare shields \w and|strong="H3967"\w* drew bows, \w two|strong="H3967"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* fourscore thousand: \w all|strong="H5704"\w* these \w were|strong="H2428"\w* \w mighty|strong="H7969"\w* \w men|strong="H2428"\w* \w of|strong="H3318"\w* \w valor|strong="H2428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w there|strong="H6440"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* Zerah \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Ethiopian \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* \w army|strong="H4421"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand thousand, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* three hundred chariots; \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w Mareshah|strong="H4762"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* Asa \w went|strong="H3068"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* meet \w him|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* set \w the|strong="H5921"\w* battle \w in|strong="H5921"\w* array \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* valley \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Zephathah \w at|strong="H5921"\w* Mareshah.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* Asa cried \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* said, \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* none besides \w thee|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* help, between \w the|strong="H6440"\w* mighty \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H6440"\w* strength: help \w us|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*; \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* rely \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* name \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3063"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w this|strong="H6440"\w* multitude. \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* \w art|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*; let \w not|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* prevail \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5375"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* smote \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Ethiopians|strong="H3569"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* Asa, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* Judah; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Ethiopians|strong="H3569"\w* fled.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Asa \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* people \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* pursued \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Gerar|strong="H1642"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w fell|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Ethiopians \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* could \w not|strong="H1961"\w* recover \w themselves|strong="H5921"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H5221"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* host; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w carried|strong="H3068"\w* \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w very|strong="H7227"\w* \w much|strong="H7227"\w* booty.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w they|strong="H5221"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w all|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* cities \w round|strong="H3389"\w* \w about|strong="H5221"\w* Gerar; \w for|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* fear \w of|strong="H7230"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H7725"\w* upon \w them|strong="H7725"\w*: \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w they|strong="H5221"\w* despoiled \w all|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* cities; \w for|strong="H3389"\w* \w there|strong="H7725"\w* \w was|strong="H3389"\w* \w much|strong="H7230"\w* spoil \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*.
They smote also the tents of cattle, and carried away sheep in abundance, and camels, and returned to Jerusalem.
